sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../styles/tour-details.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from "reactstrap"; import {useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import tourData from "../assets/data/tours"; import calculateAvgRating from "./../utils/avgRating"; import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg"; const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() //this is a static data, will call our API and load data from database const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) // D structure properties from tour object const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews, address, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) // format date const options = {day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric"} return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not rated" ) : ( ({reviews.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price} / per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* ======== tour reviews section ========= */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{reviews?.map(review => (
moses

{new Date("06-05-2024").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
))}
{/* ======== tour reviews section end ========= */}
) } export default TourDetails
